text: @piersmorgan The moral compass of our PM, govt ministers & #DominicCummngs has disappeared. Why didn't DC seek local help from local covid19 sppt group? Or justify calmly? Why has #PM & #Govt ministers not couragously said, "No, not on my watch" ? Is @sajidjavid the only one with backbone?
